Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: Attempt to draw a basic string telephone using items like a string and cups, but these may be vaguely represented. (e.g., drawing a line between two circles without indicating they are cups and string)
Include two human figures intended to represent students, although they may be stick figures or rudimentary shapes.
CANNOT: Accurately show how the string telephone allows sound to travel. (student likely does not convey the concept of sound traveling or might draw unrelated paths)
Clearly depict how sound travels along the string. (student might misplace arrows or neglect sound waves completely)
Correctly illustrate the necessary materials, like paper cups. (student may not label or distinguish between materials correctly)
Demonstrate the communication process effectively. (student might not show a clear interaction or connection between the two figures communicating)
Highlight features of the device that ensure it can send sound over a distance, such as tightness of string. (student possibly unaware of these aspects or conceptual features)
